edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.damgardJurikEncryptedZero
Class SigmaDJEncryptedZeroSimulatorOutput

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.damgardJurikEncryptedZero.SigmaDJEncryptedZeroSimulatorOutput
All Implemented Interfaces:
SigmaSimulatorOutput
public class SigmaDJEncryptedZeroSimulatorOutput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaSimulatorOutput

Concrete implementation of SigmaSimulatorOutput, used by SigmaDamgardJurikencryptedZeroSimulator.

It contains the a, e, z types used in the above mentioned concrete simulator.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
